document_data.mainbody:
Argen was one of the guards who served the noble family of Arrabar - House Matrell, circa 1373 DR.
Argen was one of the guards of House Matrell circa the  and could often be found in the familys barracks. He forged a friendship with the familys youngest scion - Emriana Matrell, a rebellious and talented rogue. He taught her the use of daggers in combat.
